testcase.name: testSelectAll

error.message: ### Error querying database. Cause: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.MySQLSyntaxErrorException: Table 'task_db.city' doesn't exist ### The error may exist in com/hk/task/mapper/MyBatis331Mapper.java (best guess) ### The error may involve defaultParameterMap ### The error occurred while setting parameters ### SQL: select id, name, state from city ### Cause: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.MySQLSyntaxErrorException: Table 'task_db.city' doesn't exist ; bad SQL grammar []; nested exception is com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.MySQLSyntaxErrorException: Table 'task_db.city' doesn't exist
